abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway on Tuesday revealed stakes in Norfolk Southern and Union Pacific. — five weeks after the billionaire said he had invested in three railroad companies but would not disclose the names of two.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway on Tuesday revealed stakes in Norfolk Southern and Union Pacific. — five weeks after the billionaire said he had invested in three railroad companies but would not disclose the names of two.
